name: Consequences
description:
Consequences was a narrative game we created as part of a one-week-long jam in our school.

The game follows the multiple paths the story of April, a UCLA art student, can take.

The theme of the game jam was 20-20 and so we decided to create a narration-based game that would progress trough time 20 (insert time unit) at a time after each player decisions, gradually growing. The player will make a choice and play it's consequences 20 seconds later, then make another choice and see it's results 20 minutes later and so on.

We decided to also give ourselves a challenge by Making it a 3D voxel game.

dev : MAGRY Valentin

3D assets : NG SING KWONG Tracy, SALAUD Valentin

narrative design : VINCENDEAU Mathis

game design, level design, animation, artistic direction, 2D/3D : FREUND Maxime
